alert.note: Alert for Chippewa (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:01PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chippewa County through 845 PM CDT... At 801 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of New Auburn, or 23 miles southwest of Ladysmith, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cornell around 820 PM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 53 between mile markers 113 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin.
